## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding style (Black + isort)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented hard-to-understand areas

- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings (`flake8`, `pylint`)

- [ ] I have checked for security issues (`bandit`)
